queries.description: Google Search terms and/or full URLs. Enter one item per line.

maxPagesPerQuery.description: Maximum number of Google Search result pages to be crawled for each search term or URL.

resultsPerPage.description: Number of search results for each Google result page.

mobileResults.description: If true, results for the mobile version of Google search are returned. Otherwise, desktop results are returned.

countryCode.description: Country code determining the IP address of the proxy used for the search and the Google Search domain.

languageCode.description: Language code for the search results.

locationUule.description: The code for the exact location for the Google search. Use the UULE code generator for this value.

maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of search results pages the scraper will load simultaneously.

saveHtml.description: If true, the HTML of the Google Search results pages will be stored to the default dataset.

saveHtmlToKeyValueStore.description: If true, the HTML of the Google Search results pages will be stored to the default key-value store.

includeUnfilteredResults.description: If true, low-quality results that Google filters out will be included.

customDataFunction.description: Custom JavaScript function to extract additional data from the HTML of the Google result pages.
examples: async ({ input, $, request, response, html }) => { return { pageTitle: $('title').text(), }; };
